profileAlternative.name: Xi (Cindy) Wu
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Scientist at Oracle Data Cloud
profileAlternative.summary:
I work in the field of Digital Marketing.

I received my Master's degree from the Statistics department at Stanford University. Prior to that, I graduated from the University of Michigan with double majors in Actuarial Science and Statistics. As a passionate but rigorous data scientist, I gained deep knowledge in statistics including hypothesis testing, design of experiments, statistical inference and regression analysis from both school and industry experience. I have strong programming skills in knowledge of scripting language (Python), statistical software (R) and database language (SQL).

Actuarial Exams Passed: Exam 1/P, Exam 2/FM, Exam ST

For job opportunities, please email me: cindyxiwu@gmail.com.
